sentences.en: an hour of this wandering wore out Lampard's patience.
sentences.cn: 这样漫游一个钟头，兰帕德失去了耐性。

sentences.en: Check the equipment for wear and tear.
sentences.cn: 检查设备有没有损耗。

sentences.en: Do you wear your old clothes until they fall to pieces?
sentences.cn: 你一直穿你的旧衣服，直到穿烂了为止吗？

sentences.en: excuses that are wearing thin.
sentences.cn: 变得陈腐的理由

sentences.en: He arrived on January 9, disheveled and much the worse for wear.
sentences.cn: 他是1月9号到的，蓬头垢面，疲惫不堪。

sentences.en: He wore glasses for reading.
sentences.cn: 他阅读时戴眼镜。

sentences.en: Her patience is wearing thin.
sentences.cn: 她的耐心正慢慢失去

sentences.en: His jeans have worn thin at the knees.
sentences.cn: 他牛仔裤的膝盖处已经磨薄了。

sentences.en: I had to wear long sleeves to stop myself scratching.
sentences.cn: 我只好穿上长袖衣服以免自己挠痒。

sentences.en: I used to wear trendy gear but it just looked ridiculous.
sentences.cn: 我以前常穿新潮的衣服，但看上去却滑稽可笑。

sentences.en: I wear my old shoes every day. One sole has come unglued.
sentences.cn: 我每天都穿那双旧鞋，有一只鞋底已经脱胶了。

sentences.en: I'm going to wear you out!
sentences.cn: 我要好好教训你

sentences.en: In warm weather, you should wear clothing that is cool and comfortable.
sentences.cn: 在热天里，应该穿凉快舒适的衣服。

sentences.en: Individualists say that you should be able to wear what you want.
sentences.cn: 个人主义者认为人应该想穿什么就穿什么。

sentences.en: It would dishonour my family if I didn't wear the veil.
sentences.cn: 如果我不戴面纱就会有辱门楣。

sentences.en: It's estimated that around 80 per cent of babies wear disposables.
sentences.cn: 据估计约80%的婴儿使用一次性尿布。

sentences.en: Replace your trainers when they start to show signs of wear.
sentences.cn: 运动鞋开始出现磨损迹象就要更换。

sentences.en: She can't make her mind up what to wear.
sentences.cn: 她拿不定主意穿什么。

sentences.en: Some of Wilson's eccentricities are beginning to wear thin.
sentences.cn: 人们逐渐对威尔逊的古怪行为失去了兴趣。

sentences.en: Susanna was wearing a black silk dress.
sentences.cn: 苏珊娜穿着一条黑色真丝连衣裙。

sentences.en: The cushions are starting to wear a little.
sentences.cn: 这些靠垫开始有点磨破了。

sentences.en: The drug wore off.
sentences.cn: 药效渐渐消失

sentences.en: The shop stocks an extensive range of beach wear.
sentences.cn: 这家商店备有各式各样的沙滩服装。

sentences.en: The stone steps, dating back to 1855, are beginning to wear.
sentences.cn: 那些可以追溯到1855年的石阶开始出现磨损。

sentences.en: the type was used again and again until it wore out.
sentences.cn: 铅字反复使用，直到用坏为止。

sentences.en: Various inducements are offered to encourage employees to wear safety clothing.
sentences.cn: 他们提供各种奖励以鼓励员工穿安全服。

sentences.en: Wear rubber gloves while chopping chillies as they can irritate the skin.
sentences.cn: 切辣椒时要戴橡胶手套，因为辣椒会刺激皮肤。

sentences.en: wearing out the stair carpet.
sentences.cn: 磨坏楼梯地毯。

sentences.en: You’ve worn a hole in your sock.
sentences.cn: 你的袜子磨出了个洞。
